page.title: 18Housing in the area
page.content: {MARKET BOSWORTH THERE IS A GREAT VARIETY OF HOUSING IN THE VILLAGE.THE OLD MARKET SQUARE CONTAINS SOME OLD COTTAGES,SOME OF CRUCK CONSTRUCTION, WHICH WERE ONCE WEAVERS COTTAGES.SOME OF THE WINDOWS OF THE HOUSES HAVE BEEN BLOCKED TO AVOID PAST WINDOW TAXES. ON THE EDGE OF THE VILLAGE,NEW DEVELOPMENT HAS SPRUNG UP IN THE LAST 15 YEARS. MANY OF THE HOUSES ARE OF A DETATCHED EXECUTIVE STYLE. {BARLESTONE HOUSING IN BARLESTONE HAS CHANGED GREATLY OVER THE YEARS.THE OLD HOUSES ARE IN THE VILLAGE CENTRE AND ARE MOSTLY OVER 100 YEARS. MANY HOUSES THIS CENTURY WERE BUILT IN RIBBONS ON THE ROADS OUT OF THE VILLAGE.IN THE 1970S AND 80S 2 ESTATES HAVE BEEN BUILT PRIVATELY WITH MOSTLY SMALL SEMIDETACHED HOUSES.1985 SAW THE
